title: BBQ Chorizo Meatballs
ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) bottle barbeque sauce (such as Sweet Baby Ray's® Sweet 'n Spicy)
method: Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Spray a large glass baking dish with cooking spray.
Step 2: Mix ground beef, chorizo, Parmesan cheese, bread crumbs, egg, and garlic together until well combined.
Step 3: Form mixture into about 36 meatballs. Place meatballs in rows the prepared baking dish. Drizzle barbecue sauce over each meatball until a small puddle forms at the base.
Step 4: Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until an instant-read thermometer inserted into the centers reads at least 160 degrees F (71 degrees C), 18 to 22 minutes.
